additional_buffs.description: Increases the attack power increased by Fast Sword in Guild Invasion. 5% increase for 5-star, and 10% increase for 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and can be increased up to 100%.
additional_buffs.name: Fast Sword (Guild Invasion)

additional_buffs.description: Cooldown of Change Tribe is decreased by 3 minutes for every 5-star, and 6-minutes for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and cooldown reductions based on Champion cannot exceed 1 hour
additional_buffs.name: Tribe Cooldown Reduction

buffs.description: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Sindbad is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
buffs.name: Innervate 3

buffs.description: Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 40%).
buffs.name: Battle Cry (Elf)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack speed by 9%.
Increases the attack range of all units by 7%, and the movement speed of all units by 9%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Battle Cry (Elf) Limit Break: Effect of Battle Cry (Elf) increased from 30% to 40%.

[Fast Sword (Guild Invasion)]: Increases the attack power increased by Fast Sword in Guild Invasion. 5% increase for 5-star, and 10% increase for 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and can be increased up to 100%.

Change Tribe cooldown reduction : Cooldown of Change Tribe is decreased by 3 minutes for every 5-star, and 6-minutes for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and cooldown reductions based on Champion cannot exceed 1 hour
description.skill1: Permanently increases  the beginning stage after being revived (20f, 40f, 60f, 80f, 100f)
description.skill2: Critical chance and critical damage of elf units increase in Guild Invasion (0%, 0%, 6%, 8%, 10%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Champion ]
